td.content: s:patient describes mild gradual onset of blurred vision and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he is a 25 year old white male. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily he denies smoking o:Height 170 cm, Weight 60.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered non-dilated fundus examination.
